preqs: Students must have passed MGB1010 or MGC1010 or MGP1010 or MGF1010 or MGW1010 or MGG1010 or MGS1010 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGB1010, MGC1010, MGF1010, MGG1010, MGP1010, MGS1010, MGW1010} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: Entrepreneurship develops students' understanding and capacity to launch and manage new as well as innovative business ideas. A combination of theory and practice is integrated into the conceptualisation and application of the entrepreneur phenomenon and the entrepreneurship process. Students will be able to conduct self-evaluation and analysis of their surroundings in order to identify business opportunities that can be exploited to the benefit of the individual entrepreneur as well as the societies at large.
